title: What is the name of the new organ discovered recently? - Quora

response.answer_text: The interstitium! If I remember correctly, the researchers from New York University's School of Medicine said that it is nearly everywhere! By “everywhere” they meant just below the skin's surface, surrounding arteries and veins, casing the fibrous tissue between muscles, and lining our digestive tracts, lungs, and urinary systems. Also, Neil Theise, a professor at NYU's School of Medicine expressed that this new “organ” could help researchers better understand the spread of cancer! It’s funny how an accidental discovery could be so promising. :)
